_comment: Main Branch Protection Ruleset - Exported configuration for repository governance
_usage_note: To apply this ruleset, use: gh api -X PUT /repos/anokye-labs/akwaaba/rulesets -F @.github/rulesets/main-branch-protection.json
_export_command: To export current rulesets: pwsh -File scripts/Export-Ruleset.ps1 -Owner "anokye-labs" -Repo "akwaaba"
name: Main Branch Protection
_enforcement_comment: Set to 'active' for full enforcement. Use 'evaluate' to test without blocking.

rules._rule_comment: Require pull requests for all changes to main branch
Require status checks to pass before merging
Block force pushes to maintain commit history integrity
Prevent accidental or malicious branch deletion

bypass_actors._bypass_comment: Organization administrators can bypass in emergencies
